title: [FSX/P3D] FTX: NA 11S Sekiu Airport
description:
Located on a beautiful coastal location on the Olympic Peninsula, 11S Sekiu is Orbx developer Misha CajicÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s second project for the Pacific Northwest. Sekiu is famous for its salmon fishing and other recreational activities, as well as being a popular summer holiday location. Deer roam on the airport grounds from September to March, so be mindful of the careless one crossing the runway! The airport area has all the little details included, as well as almost all of the Orbx Flow technologies, with moving trees and grass which react to wind speed, and SnowFlow, which covers the buildings and grass during January in a chilly coat of snow. The coverage area also includes Callam Bay, the township of Sekiu and its boat docks, as well as Pillar Point and the Pysht river delta in high detail. It also extends to cover the Callam Bay correctional centre and helipad, which is fully modelled for immersive helicopter ops!

    Large photoreal area at 30/60cm resolution
    Beautiful coastal location on the Olympic Peninsula!
    Fully custom modeled airport and objects
    Advanced rendering and ambient occlusion techniques
    Custom vegetation and long grass for amazing atmosphere
    FSX gmax ground poly runway, aprons and lights
    Includes SnowFlow and freezing rivers and lakes during hard winter
    Expert 5 seasons color matched imagery
    CreatureFlow, inc. butterflies, bugs and deer crossing the runway
    Includes fully modeled bonus Callam Bay prison helipad
    Developed by Misha Cajic
